entities

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • sidescroller.PClass
      • objects.EditableObject
        • entities.Player

  • public class Player
extends EditableObject

    Player Class

    This class handles the playable character. It covers controlling, animating, displaying, and updating the character.
